sale.name: Test Collection

epoque.name: EPOQUE
epoque.description:
Your past, your future, your EPOQUE.
The EPOQUE line arose from the serendipitous and unintended actions of fashion designers, and has gradually become a tradition among designers over hundreds of years. This not-for-profit, pure, and calm-minded approach to fashion design will become a tenet for every era.

nian.name: Made by 0011
nian.description:
Established Year 0011.
In order to celebrate the victory over the Nian beast, artisans craft clothes each year for soldiers in the image and colors of the Nian beast. Year after year follows, with festivities and celebrations roaring like firecrackers.

whirlwind.name: 0011/Tempest
whirlwind.description:
New Year, New Trends.
0011's sub-brand, 'Tempest,' focuses on capturing the sights and sounds of the streets. This series is rooted in the inspired and constantly-shifting styles of the streets, transforming the latest and trendiest ideas into a revolutionary new look.

summer.name: Coral Coast
summer.description:
Show your true self!
Coral Coast is a sub-brand of MARTHE, mainly for water sports and summer attire, imbuing fashion with the vitality of summer. Inheriting MARTHE's philosophy, this series focuses on bringing cutting-edge design to fit the needs of the wearer, and embellishing the coastline with beautiful colors year after year.

marthe.name: MARTHE
marthe.description:
Go all out.
A famous sports fashion brand with a renowned Kazdel designer. This brand has gained popularity in the sportswear market throughout many countries, and particularly loved in Ursus. It has many sub-brands, which intimately cater to the complex needs of its customers.

witch.name: Witch Feast
witch.description:
The night approaches, and the Witch Feast is nigh.
Rhodes Island holds its Witch Feast festivities every year, turning an ancient tradition long restricted to female Sarkaz into something everyone can enjoy. During the merriment, colorful costumes and decorations can be seen all over, and these festive outfits are sure to become a fond memory for all the operators.

winter.name: Cambrian Series
winter.description:
Do not fear the cold.
The Cambrian brand is known for its cold-protection properties. Well received in the colder regions of Terra, Cambrian gradually expanded outwards with the advent of greater climate change. One of the original brands for messengers, Cambrian continues to introduce new products but holds onto the same core ideal - providing safety, warmth, and elegance.

xmas.name: Icefield Messenger
xmas.description:
He giveth, yet asketh for nothing in return.
Since ancient times, the legend of a messenger has circulated across Terra. Wearing a red outfit and riding a sleigh, he crossed the vast snowy tundra to deliver life-saving supplies to others. To commemorate this messenger, his story has become a brand, carrying people's simple and pure wishes.

wild.name: Vitafield
wild.description:
Life, Unbound.
The Vitafield line focuses on the design of outdoor attire. We heard our customers' desire for exploring the world around them, and delivered with our lightweight, durable, and exceptionally-designed products. After finishing the first production run, Vitafield became a novel trend even among the general public.

sweep.name: Raythean Pioneer
sweep.description:
Pioneer, explore the unknown.
The Pioneer series is a subdivision of Raythean, dedicated to providing new possibilities for professionals. The Pioneer series fills the niche of a clothing market suited for professionals who work in extreme environments. Emphasizing reliability, ease of use, and easy maintenance, allow us to accompany you as you pioneer uncharted territory.

boc.name: Bloodline of Combat
boc.description:
Through the bloodline, the struggle continues.
'Bloodline of Combat' is an experimental personal equipment series developed by Rhodes Island in collaboration with other organizations based upon the actual needs of operators. The equipment is densely packed with advanced, and potentially even dangerous technology, for operators to be able to deal with the most demanding tasks. Rhodes Island and its operators never give up.

kitchen.name: Rhodes Kitchen
kitchen.description:
Fine clothes, fine flavors, and a fine future.
Rhodes Island operators hail from every corner of Terra, and bring with them their own cuisine from home. The festive attire of the Rhodes Kitchen series originate from a combination of food culture and the operators' feedback, brought to life with the artistry of the designer operators.

ghost.name: Dreambind Castle
ghost.description:
Your terrorbound slumber. Face your fears.
Once again, Pathyell Castle has been shrouded in mist. Dreams torment the people, while wicked spirits run the streets amok. The Viscount of the Final Age, who set these affairs in motion, now lies dormant far beneath the castle grounds. The Operative Investigators are called to settle the matter—they must delve deep into the Castle, and unearth its truest secrets held within.

race.name: Whistlewind
race.description:
Cheers for racing!!!
The Whistlewind brand boasts a depth of years tied to the clothing of Victoria's motor races. With mature design experience and assembly pipelines, ensuring aesthetics as a first principle, conducting rigorous checks on material quality, its sole goal is to offer the most intimate support to the race queens and drivers as they ascend the podium, world watching.

striker.name: Raythean Striker
striker.description:
Striker, valiantly step forward.
The Striker series is a subdivision of Raythean, dedicated to providing equipment support to professional specialist units. The Striker series gives all-round consideration to a breadth of scenarios involving specialist combat, employing on-site tests to ensure product performance. Allow us to accompany you as you strike forth, prevail, and press onward.

ambienceSynesthesia.name: Ambience Synesthesia
ambienceSynesthesia.description:
Heart with the rhythm, give it up to the rock.
Every concert embodies its hosts' beating blood, and preparing performers' outfits with that in mind is the one and only mission of the Ambience Synesthesia brand. No matter whether formal or streetwear, we'll stop at no end to provide musicians the most fitting attire for when the lights go on.

crossover.name: Collab Series
crossover.description:
Together we stand.
Rhodes Island cooperates with other organizations to launch these fashion lines. These mutually beneficial cooperation agreements create a win-win situation, and operators even get to enjoy some fresh attire.

shining.name: Shining Steps
shining.description:
Step up, all eyes on you!
Monster Siren Records' exclusive idol project clothing brand invites big-name designers to dedicate themselves to the art of stage costumes for young people with idol dreams. The time is now, step up to the ladder and climb the rungs to be the idol only you can be!

game.name: Achievement Star
game.description:
Press Start
Casual clothing made for gamers, comfortable while maximizing the gaming experience.

char_285_medic2.description: Bloodline of Combat Collection/Shore Rescue Modification. Lancet-2 was unexpectedly shot down into the water while aiding Ægir refugees off the coast of Iberia, and remained afloat for three months until located and retrieved by a Rhodes Island search and rescue team.

The work outfit worn by Magallan to make shaved ice during the food festival combines traditions of Higashi with characteristics of Rhine Labs. Breathable, well-insulated, and easy to move in, this outfit allows Magallan to fully devote herself to her work, even if in a shaved-ice shop.

char_1012_skadi2.name: Elite 0
char_1012_skadi2.description:
The outfit Skadi wore when she went to Sal Viento.
Though not certain to be more practical than a uniform, it is very comfortable, and also unalike to a bounty hunter's style.

char_1012_skadi2.name: Elite 2
char_1012_skadi2.description:
You dimly, darkly feel that what happened in Sal Viento will change all, and that you simply cannot make out yet how fate's currents flow.
No matter how it is put, there is a freshness you perceive in this outfit she wears.

char_1012_skadi2.name: Sublimation
char_1012_skadi2.description: Bloodline of Combat Collection/Sublimation. In the ocean-soaked wreckage of this great Iberian chapel rests He, and His song comes from the efferent throat, to reach the ears of every Seaborn.

char_1031_slent2.name: Elite 0
char_1031_slent2.description:
An outfit worn by Silence while operating in Trimounts.
A symbiosis of convenience and fashion, the pieces were personally selected by the famous film star Marianne Blake.

char_1031_slent2.name: Elite 2
char_1031_slent2.description:
Silence decided to abandon her past self's weakness to achieve her goals.
She buries the gentle side of her deep within, and walks onto the stage, vowing to show everyone her views.

char_250_phatom.description: Clothes of Phantom's, the attire he sported while staffing the 'Dreambind Castle' event. The dance as cloth, the song as silk, the threading through emotion, the tailoring by fabrication, the weave of obliteration and howling madness, it all culminates in this majestic yet skin-crawling ensemble.

char_250_phatom.name: Focus
char_250_phatom.description: Test Collection Series/Focus. The attire Phantom wore when he left for the castle, and the costume for his maiden performance. After an age of gathering dust, it finally sees the light of day again.

char_1028_texas2.name: Elite 0
char_1028_texas2.description:
Attire worn by Texas following her return to Siracusa.
Exceptionally exquisite tailoring, exactingly custom-made to old Siracusan famiglie standards.

char_1028_texas2.name: Elite 2
char_1028_texas2.description:
She leaves Siracusa once again, not to flee the past, but to change the future.
This outfit neither binds her nor stands for her. She is merely Texas.

char_1029_yato2.name: Elite 0
char_1029_yato2.description:
Yato obtained this in a chance encounter in Higashi.
Made from materials obtained from the Phantom Beast Kirin, a creature from another world, and imbued with the power of thunder.

char_1029_yato2.name: Elite 2
char_1029_yato2.description:
A white flash cuts through the attack. The dual blades send lightning to all four corners.
She charges towards the night like the thunder, as she always has.
